sections.title: Gathering Powers
sections.description: Test @Focus to gather a power. If you succeed, you can gather a power card from your power deck and keep this card until your next @NightsRest.
sections.mechanics: Roll 1d10 against @Focus. If the roll is equal to or less than your @Focus score, gather one power from your deck. If you fail, take 1 damage and discard your current cards
sections.limits: You can only have 3 powers gathered at one time. If you want to discard a power to replace it, you must discard all in your hand.
sections.recovery: When you @Gritteeth, you automatically gather 3 powers without needing to test @Focus.

sections.title: Casting Powers
sections.description: You can play power cards at any time, triggering their effect. Follow the instructions on the power card.
sections.targeting: You cannot target something with a power if you cannot perceive it, although you might still be able to harm it. You cannot select a target without a clear unbroken line from you to the location of it.
sections.recovery: Discarded powers can be returned to your power deck when you complete a @NightsRest.
